snippet: The Fort Worth, Texas, company Cleaning Guys has dealt with hazardous spills. It has cleared bloody crime scenes, including some that involved HIV....

headline.print_headline: Crew at Ebola Home Steps Into National Spotlight
headline.main: Crew at Ebola Home Steps Into National Spotlight

lead_paragraph: The Fort Worth, Texas, company Cleaning Guys has dealt with hazardous spills. It has cleared bloody crime scenes, including some that involved HIV.
